script:
# script "lisp"
# background "Manga_back"
# bgm "stop"
# bottonsout 0 0
# frameout 0 0
# textwindow "close"
# imageset 0 "Manga_logo"
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imagelayer 0 8
# imageset 1 "Manga_02_1_0"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 8
# imagescale 1 0.9 0
# imageset 2 "Manga_02_1_1"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 10
# imagescale 2 0.9 0
# imageset 3 "Manga_02_1_2"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 10
# imagescale 3 0.9 0
# imageset 4 "Manga_02_2_0"
# imagealpha 4 0 0
# imagelayer 4 8
# imagescale 4 0.9 0
# imageset 5 "Manga_02_2_1"
# imagealpha 5 0 0
# imagelayer 5 10
# imagescale 5 0.9 0
# imageset 6 "Manga_02_2_2"
# imagealpha 6 0 0
# imagelayer 6 10
# imagescale 6 0.9 0
# imageset 7 "Manga_02_3_0"
# imagealpha 7 0 0
# imagelayer 7 10
# imagescale 7 0.9 0
# imageset 8 "Manga_02_3_1"
# imagealpha 8 0 0
# imagelayer 8 10
# imagescale 8 0.9 0
# imageset 9 "Manga_02_3_2"
# imagealpha 9 0 0
# imagelayer 9 10
# imagescale 9 0.8 0
# waitandnext 0.5

;;タイトル
# se "SE_0819"
# imagealpha 0 1 1
# imagepos 0 0 0

# imagealpha 0 0 1
# waitandnext 1.5

;;1コマ
# bgm "bgm002" 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0.8
# imagepos 1 0 0
# waitandnext 1.5

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0001"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 2 1 0.5
# imagepos 2 100 0
# imagemoveto 2 0 0 0.5

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0002"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 1 0.5
# imagepos 3 -100 0
# imagemoveto 3 0 0 0.5

;;進む
# imagealpha 1 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 1 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 2 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 2 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 3 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 3 0 500 0.4
# waitandnext 0.4

;;2コマ
# imagealpha 4 1 0.6
# imagepos 4 0 -500
# imagemoveto 4 0 0 0.4
# waitandnext 0.8

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0003"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 5 1 0.5
# imagepos 5 100 0
# imagemoveto 5 0 0 0.5

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0004"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 6 1 0.3
# imagepos 6 -100 0
# imagemoveto 6 0 0 0.5

;;進む
# imagealpha 4 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 4 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 5 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 5 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 6 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 6 0 500 0.4
# waitandnext 0.4

;;3コマ
# bgmfile "bgm086" "BgmRaid" 0
# imagealpha 7 1 0.6
# imagepos 7 0 -500
# imagemoveto 7 0 0 0.4
# waitandnext 0.8

;;上書き
# imageset 1 "Manga_02_4_0"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 8
# imagescale 1 0.9 0
# imageset 2 "Manga_02_4_1"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 10
# imagescale 2 0.9 0
# imageset 3 "Manga_02_4_2"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 10
# imagescale 3 0.9 0
# imageset 4 "Manga_02_4_3"
# imagealpha 4 0 0
# imagelayer 4 10
# imagescale 4 0.9 0
# imageset 5 "Manga_02_4_4"
# imagealpha 5 0 0
# imagelayer 5 10
# imagescale 5 0.9 0
;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0005"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 8 1 0.5
# imagepos 8 100 0
# imagemoveto 8 0 0 0.5
# imagealpha 9 1 0.5
# imagepos 9 -100 0
# imagemoveto 9 0 0 0.5
# waitandnext 3.1

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0006"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagescale 9 0.9 0.5
# waitandnext 1.5

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0007"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagescale 8 1 0.5
# waitandnext 1.9

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0008"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagescale 9 1.3 0.5
# imagemoveto 9 40 0 0.5

;;進む
# imagealpha 7 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 7 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 8 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 8 0 500 0.4
# imagealpha 9 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 9 0 500 0.4
# waitandnext 0.4

;;4コマ
# imagealpha 1 1 0.6
# imagepos 1 0 -500
# imagemoveto 1 0 0 0.4
# waitandnext 0.8

# se "SE_9457"
;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0009"
# waitandnext 0.5

# sedelay "SE_9457" 0.8
# imagealpha 2 1 0.5
# imagepos 2 100 0
# imagemoveto 2 0 0 0.5
# waitandnext 3.4

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0010"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 1 0.5
# imagepos 3 100 0
# imagemoveto 3 0 0 0.3
# waitandnext 2

# se "SE_9457"
# sedelay "SE_9457" 0.3
;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_3_0011"
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 4 1 0.5
# imagepos 4 100 0
# imagemoveto 4 0 0 0.3
# waitandnext 2

# imagealpha 5 1 1
# imagepos 5 0 0

# fadeout "black" 2
# waitandnext 2.5
